channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 07:42 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 07:42 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:45 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Axiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirovsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 05:45 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Axiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirovsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
